quickActions.name: Rule‑1 Check & Fix (Add‑Only)
quickActions.description: Scan file and propose additive edits only.
quickActions.prompt: Avoid restricted vocabulary; prefer 'runtime'. Add-only diffs. If unsure, ask. Output DIFF only.

quickActions.name: UPR Double‑Audit
quickActions.prompt: Run two independent audits (lint/type/tests). Only declare CLEAN if both pass; else propose add-only fixes.

quickActions.name: No‑Lie Guard
quickActions.prompt: Do not invent facts. If unsure, say 'Unknown locally' and suggest a local verification step.
